title: ‘No Bonks, Less Fatigue’: Simon Yates on Cycling’s Game-Changing Carb Revolution
content:
Simon Yates opens up about cycling’s carbohydrate revolution and its transformative impact on his career as he hits re-set in high-profile transfer to Visma-Lease a Bike.

Read the full article at ‘No Bonks, Less Fatigue’: Simon Yates on Cycling’s Game-Changing Carb Revolution on Velo.
